alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 11:55AM EST until January 06 at 4:29AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Jackson and Barrow Counties. For the Middle Oconee River...including Auburn, Winder, Arcade, Athens...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Arcade. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand further into the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A few dirt access roads and a residential yard just downstream will be flooded with up to 4 feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 19.9 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
